channel.title: Vicious-Revolution [] New Survival Minigame [] Growing Fast [] updated thread
channel.description: [center][img]http://i1242.photobucket.com/albums/gg532/viciouse-rev/sigforvicious_zpsb6bfee61.png[/img][/center] ---Link's--- Webiste: www.vicious-revolution.com Webclient: http://vicious-revolution.com/playnow.php -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Welcome to Vicious-Revolution. We strive in a healthy economy and nice feature's. ---Feature List--- -Fully working CoinShare system -New PVM system ( drop chamber ) -Perfect PvP combat switching and combo's -Every Skill working -All skill's have their own area's to train -Many stable way's to make money -9 Boss's all with perfect drop rate's -New Armor's/Weapon's -6 Fully Working Minigame's featuring, Knights Assult. -Great PKing area's -Clipped NPC's/Following/Attacking -Auto Donations -Auto Vote4Cash (3.5M ea) -Highscore's on website ---Media--- [center][youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BSYUxNOkhLo[/youtube][/center] [img]http://i1242.photobucket.com/albums/gg532/viciouse-rev/thieving_zps527aa224.png[/img] item.title: Vicious-Revolution [] New Survival Minigame [] Growing Fast [] updated thread
item.dc:creator: @Pink_Phat Pink Phat
item.description:
@Pink_Phat wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:43, topic:460284”][quote author=eclipse rsps link=topic=563203.msg4128926#msg4128926 date=1350826975]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=563203.msg4128802#msg4128802 date=1350797544]

The economy is fine
[/quote]no it isnt, it wasn’t even fine the first two days of me playing what makes you think its fine now. How much you want you to bet I could log in tomorrow and find everyone in either barrows or bandos or something similar?

Not one person in-game has bandos, bandos drop rate’s are very low. Barrows-yes people have them, why wouldnt they. The economy is fine.
[/quote]you just proved my point babe <3

look at rs for instance. About 40% of the high levels have barrows while everyone else wears rune ( we aren’t counting bandos/merchers with torva and etc )

Now look at your server list how many different ip accounts actually don’t own at least a piece of barrows (y)[/quote]
rsps and rs are not the same

Read full topic
